examples.example: 这次旅行真是太好玩了，我们都玩得很开心。

translate.english: This trip is really so much fun, and we all had a great time.

examples.example: 周末和朋友们一起去游乐场，那里的游乐项目都非常好玩。

translate.english: Go to the amusement park with friends on the weekend, and the amusement items there are all very interesting.

examples.example: 那部新上映的电影超级好玩，大家看得十分投入。

translate.english: That newly released movie is extremely fun and everyone watches it very devotedly.
